channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Broken abandoned sink left flytipped on verge, 2nd December
item.description:
Broken abandoned sink left flytipped on grass verge at end of road.

item.title: Abandoned car, 2nd December
item.description:
This silver car has been abandoned since this afternoon, it’s blocking road users from driving on the road.

item.title: Fly tipping a mixture of rubbish, 2nd December
item.description:
This site is getting worse day by day. People are adding bags, boxes and a mattress. This is now a hazard and has been for over two weeks. This is the bin site at the end of Gaywood Street, SE1 6HG next to the sheltered accommodation. This is close to where my parents live. Sites like this attract mice and rats and need to cleared.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Elephant and Castle, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Linale House Bins why pay councilTax, 2nd December
item.description:

item.title: Riverside Garden, At Mary Cray, 2nd December
item.description:

item.title: The last lamp post of Kingsley Road on the side of Priory Park Road, 2nd December
item.description:
The lamp post has been off for a month now leaving the end of the road completely in the dark. This has instigated even more fly-tipping. The column should be number 06.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Priory Park Road, London

item.title: Please can the trolleys be removed and the pavement cleaned?, 2nd December
item.description:

item.title: Trip Hazard, 2nd December
item.description:
Cracked broken, rocking paving outside H&H Property Management, 246 Bexley Rd, DA8 3HB. The worst part goes up and down by at least 25mm. I have already tripped over it once. I spoke to the people in H&H property management and they said it was Bexley Council responsibility.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bexley Road, Northumberland Heath, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
